thread.title: Deal struck over BHS pension scheme
thread.title_full: Deal struck over BHS pension scheme

title: Deal struck over BHS pension scheme
text:
Deal struck over BHS pension scheme 28 February 2017 Read more about sharing. Close share panel Sir Philip Green has agreed a Â£363m cash settlement with the Pensions Regulator to plug the gap in the BHS pension scheme. 
Workers will get the same starting pension that they were originally promised under the agreement. 
It brings to a close a long-running negotiation over benefits for former workers of the collapsed retailer. Related Topics
